isLda.label: Fixed number of topics (use LDA)
isLda.description: If enabled, the LDA (instead of the HDP) algorithm will be used, and the number of topics will remain unchanged.

k.label: Initial number of topics:
k.description: The (initial) number of topics. Will be changed according to the data if the HDP (and not the LDA) algorithm is used.

table.label: Topic table:
table.description: The name of the table into which the most common words for each topic and their probability will be written to.

table.n.label: Number of topic words:
table.n.description: The number of most-probable words for each detected topic that will be written to the topic table.
